advancement.create.andesite_alloy.desc: Obtain some Cerametal, Create's most important resource
advancement.create.andesite_casing.desc: Using Cerametal, Zinc Rods and planks, create a basic casing for your machines
advancement.create.brass_casing.desc: Using Brass Rods and Mechanisms and planks, create a casing for more sophisticated machines
advancement.create.copper_casing.desc: Using treated wood and copper rods, create a waterproof casing for your machines
advancement.create.train_casing_00.desc: Use Black Steel Sheets and Brass Rods to create a casing for railway components
create.ponder.andesite_tunnel.text_1: Cerametal Tunnels can be used to cover up your belts
create.ponder.andesite_tunnel.text_2: Whenever an Cerametal Tunnel has connections to the sides...
create.ponder.andesite_tunnel.text_3: ...they will split exactly one item off of any passing stacks
create.ponder.andesite_tunnel.text_4: The remainder will continue on its path
create.ponder.belt_casing.text_1: Brass or Cerametal Casing can be used to decorate Mechanical Belts
create.ponder.brass_funnel.text_1: Cerametal Funnels can only ever extract single items.
create.ponder.cogwheel_casing.text_1: Brass or Cerametal Casing can be used to decorate Cogwheels
create.ponder.shaft_casing.text_1: Brass or Cerametal Casing can be used to decorate Shafts
create.ponder.mechanical_mixer.text_3: Some of those recipes may require the heat of a Burner
create.ponder.mechanical_press_compactin: Some of those recipes may require the heat of a Burner
create.ponder.steam_engine.text_6: With the help of Burners, the power output can be increased
create.ponder.train_schedule.text_4: Any mob sitting in front of Train Controls is an eligible conductor
create.ponder.blaze_burner.text_1: Gas Burners can provide Heat to Items processed in a Basin
create.ponder.blaze_burner.text_2: For this, the Burner has to be fueled with Kerosene or Gasoline
create.ponder.blaze_burner.text_3: With Kerosene, the Gas Burner can reach an even stronger level of heat
create.ponder.blaze_burner.text_4: Unlike the original Blaze Burners, Gas Burners cannot be given items.
